description: a(n+1) = a(n) * sum of digits of a(n).
comments: After the 7th element, every second element has the same beginning. a(9+2k) = 40 * a(8+2k) = 40 * 25 * a(7+2k)
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i,k,w; a:=13; print(a); for i from 1 by 1 to n do w:=0;k:=a; while k>0 do w:=w+k-(trunc(k/10)*10); k:=trunc(k/10); od; a:=a*w; print(a); od; end: P(1000); - _Paolo P. Lava_, Apr 27 2007
author: Miklos SZABO (mike(AT)ludens.elte.hu)
